data.text: @jpdoak Michelle and I were talking about that this morning. As soon as cases shoot up again in a month (which I'm betting they will) I imagine the districts here will just be like https://t.co/0YPhCuf9xt
@gjmccarthy It's really puzzling and disheartening. And it's going to be very, very hard to put the toothpaste back in the tube, so to speak, when cases invariably rise again.
